He later backtracked, saying no decision has been made and the issue would be dealt with no sooner than 2014. Fiat owns a 25 percent stake in Auburn Hills-based Chrysler.

Monday. Earlier Sunday, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand told US television that she had visited with Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her "doing great" and "making progress every day." Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's "Meet The Press" program.
